tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Against Tradition
programme.desc: Prince Nnamdi discovers that the woman he has been dating belongs to the Osu caste. Despite this revelation, he intends to marry her.

programme.title: Crazy Neighbour
programme.desc: Amidst escalating tension between neighbors, their lives are turned upside down when their landlords drastic decision forces them to confront their differences.

programme.title: The Crash
programme.desc: Scarlets love life changed for good after a plane crash that takes her face, and she has to undergo a plastic surgery. This shocks her husband Nater as he questions her new identity.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: Munas beloved is faced with harsh realities in the wake of her failure. Foreign juju to the rescue.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: Kelechi fortifies himself against the wrath of the spirits. A memorial is held for Ifeoma. Finally, a new masquerade emerges.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nwoye leaves Mgberi, Adanna and Nnanna face a surprising new revelation.

programme.title: Return Match
programme.desc: Nkisi and her brother frustrates the entire compound, but everything is about to change as Panguru steps into the compound with his son to distort their plans.

programme.title: To Love A Cripple
programme.desc: When Collins falls in love with Blessing, his mother becomes so enraged, she injures Blessing and leaves her disabled. Will Collins learn the truth and help Blessing?

programme.title: Heart Of A Princess
programme.desc: Nnenna and Adaku meet the prince and he propose to Nnenna, this gets to Adaku and she decide to make money from their union blackmailing her best friend.

programme.title: Rulers Of Power
programme.desc: After a prince fights against his own sanity, he becomes well but has to pay the ultimate price if he must become king.

programme.title: Where I Belong
programme.desc: Africa Magic Epic presents a collection of epic stories that showcase the rich cultural heritage of Nigeria.

programme.title: Wicked Heart
programme.desc: Ifeoma will stop at nothing to rob Cynthia of her joy and peace, fully backed by her malevolent father. This relentless torment continued until Cynthia lost her sanity,

programme.title: When Fools Fight
programme.desc: Zik arrives in the village and show affection to all the women, including Agnes, whom everyone believes could never find a man.

programme.title: Chaos Within
programme.desc: Sandra goes against her mothers advise and invited her stepsister Oluchi into her matrimonial home, now she will lose everything to Oluchis wicked claws.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: Kelechi reads his family the riot act. Urenna makes a heartbreaking discovery. Muna makes a huge sacrifice.

programme.title: Masquerades Of Aniedo
programme.desc: Urenna confronts her father about his infidelity. The Otu Mmanwu members deliberate and swear to prove their innocence. Eze Dibia pleads with the spirits for a miracle.

programme.title: My Life My Fate
programme.desc: Ebere and Nene suffer a great deal in the hands of the villagers who want to take advantage of them, but everything change when Maduka shows up.

programme.title: Entangled Truth
programme.desc: Nze and Samantha, once deeply in love are separated by lifes challenges. Despite this, Nze remained loyal to her. But the worse is yet to happen.

programme.title: Major Key
programme.desc: Hector watches while his friends, Tobi and Saint kill Njideka. Now her ghost is back for revenge, but will Hector survive?

programme.title: Discovery
programme.desc: A relentless womanizers world shatters when he suffers a stroke.The consequences of his infidelity takes an unforeseen turn when his wife gathered some information.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Those closest to Ochuko plot to steal her wealth and eliminate anyone who stands in their way. Fortunately, her father has a plan for her.

programme.title: Pregnant Slave
programme.desc: Banished in shame, Udogadi finds healing in Ebubes love and rises to become the savior who secures her fathers crown.

programme.title: She Must Approve
programme.desc: Ken has a daughter Elena, and he will do anything to please. Her duty is to approve any woman her father will marry.

programme.title: Painful Marriage
programme.desc: Obiora and Uju are passing through hell because Obiora refuse to send his wife away and marry NmaMiri the princess of the sea.

programme.title: Tolanis Trials
programme.desc: An all-ladies retreat is disrupted by a startling revelation.This unexpected bombshell leaves them on edge, questioning what other secrets lie hidden.

programme.title: Love Unusual
programme.desc: A disgraced ex-teacher runs into the love of his life, the woman who was the reason he got sent to jail.

programme.title: Lucky Me
programme.desc: Victor is a promising young man who just never seems to make any headway with work or women. Down on his last luck, Victor sets out to turn his fortunes around.

programme.title: Jofran
programme.desc: Joseph is the perfect picture of a doting husband. Francisca was content with her man until she starts having strange dreams and Josephs buried traits are unearthed.

programme.title: Love Come Back
programme.desc: Its not easy saying Im sorry but with a beautiful surprise and help from the Love Come Back team, getting your love back might not be that hard after all.

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.title: The Rishantes
programme.desc: Halita faces humiliation and suffering in the kidnappers den.

programme.title: Tinsel
programme.desc: The story follows the lives, rivalries, and relationships of two film production companies, exploring power, love, and betrayal.

programme.title: Riona
programme.desc: Ofotonku reacts to Aghans challenge. Jolomi makes his decision about the call to service. Atigbi finds the rebels, and all sides continue to press forward.

programme.title: Forbidden
programme.desc: The secret affair between two lovers is exposed when the ladys colleague sends a picture of the couple making out to the blogs.

programme.title: Jofran
programme.desc: Joseph is the perfect picture of a doting husband. Francisca was content with her man until she starts having strange dreams and Josephs buried traits are unearthed.

programme.desc: Donatus, suspicious of Dans activities, enlists Bonquisha to covertly gather information, escalating mistrust between the two friends.

programme.title: Dust
programme.desc: Loves journey from butterflies to bitter end. A modern twist on Romeo and Juliets tale of passion turns to hate.

programme.title: Hook, Line And Sinkah
programme.desc: Ugo is alone for the weekend and decides to invite a girl over. He calls up three different girls, who are each not sure they can make it.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Years after Ezinne and Peter started EE and A, they tackle a high-profile murder case. An emotionally fragile Ugo attends therapy and Mama Ugo longs for her family.

programme.title: Stolen Life
programme.desc: A successful young man, struggling to feel attraction even to women he loved, seeks therapy to uncover the cause but unexpectedly discovers himself drawn to love.

programme.title: Unmarried
programme.desc: Three inseparable young ladies strive to survive the dynamics of friendship, career challenges, relationships, as well as general issues.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Donatus is confronted by Willy for preventing him from arresting Kiki.

programme.title: Glass House
programme.desc: Adaku dreams of settling with Emeka after NYSC. Chief Amadi offers Emeka a job, while chief Azubuike threatens him. Uju and Oscar plot, leading to Emekas death.

programme.desc: The story follows the lives, rivalries, and relationships of two film production companies, exploring power, love, and betrayal.

programme.title: Dust
programme.desc: Loves journey from butterflies to bitter end. A modern twist on Romeo and Juliets tale of passion turns to hate.

programme.title: Debbies Salon

programme.title: Ti-Ghana Island
programme.desc: War breaks out TI Island as the kingpin wants Alex to marry his troublesome daughter and leaves his lover. Will Alex accept the offer?

programme.title: Extreme Car Hoarders

programme.title: Chips
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent teams up with a rookie officer in the California Highway Patrol to root out the dirty officers robbing cash delivery trucks.

programme.title: What Men Want
programme.desc: When a bump on the head after a night out leaves a sports agent able to hear mens thoughts, she uses it to get the edge on and ahead of her rivals.

programme.title: Palm Springs
programme.desc: A reluctant maid of honour bonds with one of the wedding guests, only to learn she is now stuck in the time loop he has been trapped in for weeks.

programme.title: Disturbing The Peace
programme.desc: When a small town is turned upside down by a gang of bikers, hell-bent on robbery, a marshal must overcome his emotional past to keep everyone safe.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Under Siege
programme.desc: A SWAT compound comes under fire from a terrorist who is chasing a mystery man apprehended by the Seattle SWAT.

programme.title: Top End Wedding
programme.desc: Lauren and Ned have just ten days to find Laurens mother, reunite her parents and pull off their dream wedding.

programme.title: Status Update
programme.desc: A troubled teenagers life is turned around when he acquires a mysterious phone app that transforms his social media updates from fantasy to reality.

programme.title: Alvin And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Three hilariously musical chipmunks are discovered by an aspiring singer-songwriter. He befriends the chipmunks and tries to become famous.

programme.title: Just Wright
programme.desc: A physical therapist meets a professional basketball player, who then falls for her sister, but is he with the wrong woman?

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: An accident leaves an unreconstructed executive able to read womens minds. Initially appalled, it is pointed out to him how useful this could be.

programme.title: A Madea Christmas
programme.desc: Madea takes her unique festive spirit to a rural town when she helps a friend pay her daughter a surprise visit for Christmas.

programme.title: Drumline: A New Beat
programme.desc: A young woman heads across country to college, planning to break new ground and revive its drumline, but reckons without a few emotional obstacles.

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic and his family face trouble when Shaws brother seeks bloody revenge.

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes Bryan Mills when he is framed for his ex-wifes murder. He calls on all his special skills to get his revenge and clear his name.

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: A group of holidaymakers are given access to a secluded beach, but start to age faster than normal. Can they find out why before their time runs out?

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: A lake is a popular destination for partying teens, but they little suspect that seismic activity is about to fill it with ravenous prehistoric fish.

programme.title: Filly Brown
programme.desc: A street poet gets a shot at fame after being approached by a major label. However, accepting the deal means she must make some tough compromises.

programme.title: All Styles
programme.desc: A teenager chooses college over a dance competition and is promptly ditched by his crew. Cue a showdown as he assembles a team for a national contest.

programme.title: Alvin And The Chipmunks: The...
programme.sub-title: Alvin And The Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: The famous chipmunk trio return to deal with the pressures of school, celebrity and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

programme.title: Alvin And The Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
programme.desc: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up trapped in a tropical paradise.

programme.title: Alvin And The Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Worried that Dave will dump them if he proposes to his new girlfriend, the Chipmunks travel to Miami to stop him.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: An Australian man uses Google Earth to find his long-lost family and journey home back to india after 25 years, recounting his journey of survival.

programme.title: A Cinderella Story
programme.desc: Bullied by her stepsisters and stepmother, a young woman longs to meet her online romance at a Halloween dance.

programme.title: Jurassic World Dominion
programme.desc: As dinosaurs cause chaos, Owen Grady and Claire Dearing team up with some familiar faces to rescue Maisie Lockwood from Biosyns clutches.

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: A group of children stumble across a superheros base, shortly before it comes under attack from evil villains, and join in the fight to defend it.

programme.title: The Fate Of The Furious
programme.desc: The crew find themselves facing new trials when a mysterious woman gets one of their number involved in the world of terrorism.

programme.desc: What should have been a calm family holiday in the woods takes a turn into terror when four strangers arrive at the door with a horrifying demand.

programme.title: Kickboxer
